response.overview: December 19th, 2010 :: Big Japan Pro-Wrestling presents Death Vegas 2010 from the Yokohama Cultural Gymnasium in Yokohama, Kanagawa, Japan with an attendance of 2,952.  Matches include: • BJW Death Match Heavyweight Title 450 Fluorescent Light Tubes Death Match Ryuji Ito (c) vs. Abdullah Kobayashi • Extreme Table Chair Death Match Yoshihito Sasaki vs. Jaki Numazawa • Ladder Death Match Jun Kasai vs. Masashi Takeda • Daisuke Sekimoto & Shuji Ishikawa vs. Shinya Ishikawa & Yuji Okabayashi • Barbed Wire Board Death Match Ouetsu Reppan Domei (Shadow WX & Takashi Sasaki) & Kankuro Hoshino vs. Yankee Two Kenju (Isami Kodaka & Yuko Miyamoto) & Shinobu • Daikokubo Benkei & Onryo vs. Masato Inaba & Yuichi Taniguchi • Atsushi Ohashi & Ryuichi Kawakami vs. Kazuki Hashimoto & Takumi Tsukamoto.
response.title: BJW Death Vegas 2010
